io.mola.galimatias

Class StrictErrorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mola.galimatias.StrictErrorHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorHandler

    public final class StrictErrorHandler
extends Object
implements ErrorHandler
    Strict ErrorHandler. It throws an exception on any parse error, even recoverable ones.
